scripts.seed: rimraf dist && npm run build && node ./dist/util/seedTest.js
scripts.restart: rimraf dist && npm run build && npm start
scripts.test-community: rimraf dist && npm run build && jest ./dist/resources/communities  --detectOpenHandles
scripts.test-direct-message: rimraf dist && npm run build && jest ./dist/resources/socket.emit.handlers/direct_message/ --detectOpenHandles
scripts.test-chatroom: rimraf dist && npm run build && jest ./dist/resources/socket.emit.handlers/chat_room/__test__/ --detectOpenHandles
